oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Use of nutritional consultation in beef cattle practive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hentschl, Arnold F.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cattle diseases
nutrition
feeding
respiratory disease
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: When first becoming involved with herd health maintenance activities with feedlot producers it became obvious that although respiratory disease caused a substantial loss to the producer, improved management of the ration and related matters could provide an improved financial return to the producer. To address the topic of feedlot nutritional consultation it is appropriate to begin by discussing the ration of incoming feeder cattle.
